titleStmt.title: Fragmentary Stela of Angkor Borei (K. 24), 7th century CE

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: The basic punctuation sign in this text is an ornate double daṇḍa written in one continuous movement, resembling an inverted S-shape. The name of the poet being made known in the text itself, it is possibile that the hand is that of the poet.

projectDesc.p: This project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.head: Face
div.p:

div.head: Face
div.p:
... ku kur(·) sin· $dotMid ...
... ku si $dotMid pau tai $dotMid ku tāṅ· $dotMid ku paṅ·...
... ku toṅ· kon· [d]e[r]· t]ai [$dotMid] pau sī...
...ṅs(a) $dotMid ku ca...

... va teṅ· $dotMid va dvār· $dotMid va jikāy· $dotMid va soḥ $dotMid va Ahaṁ mūla $dotMid va kohv· $dotMid va kāy· $dotMid va ṅas· ru $dotMid va piluṅ sin· $dotMid ta klamuṁ ku ṇiy· $dotMid ku teṅ· $dotMid ku vut· $dotMid ...
... ku vut sin· $dotMid ku teṅ· $dotMid ku teṅ sin· $dotMid ku kur· $dotMid ku mas· $dotMid ku yoṅ· $dotMid ku roy· $dotMid ku son· $dotMid ku toy· $dotMid ku mau $dotMid ku tā {1}y· $dotMid ku jā Ārttai ku vo $dotMid ku teṁ $dotMid ku teṅ· $dotMid ...
...y· $dotMid ku tai $dotMid ku tāṅ· $dotMid kantai ta konna ku tey· $dotMid lān tai $dotMid ku tak· $dotMid ku vai $dotMid pau si $dotMid ku vo sin· $dotMid ku cuṅ· $dotMid ku kur· $dotMid lāṅ tai $dotMid pau ...
In his Inscriptions du Cambodge, volume VIII, Coedès states that there are 17 lines on the face A.
First edited by George Coedes (216-17) without translation; re-edited here by Kunthea Chhom from the EFEO estampage n. 395.
